price: 205. Y si se aleja de ti, camina por la tierra corrompiéndola y arrasa los campos y los ganados; y a Al-lah no le gustan los corruptores.
arabic: وَإِذَا تَوَلَّىٰ سَعَىٰ فِي ٱلۡأَرۡضِ لِيُفۡسِدَ فِيهَا وَيُهۡلِكَ ٱلۡحَرۡثَ وَٱلنَّسۡلَۚ وَٱللَّهُ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡفَسَادَ

version.title: Spanish Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish. published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: wa-idhā tawallā saʿā fī al-arḍi liyuf'sida fīhā wayuh'lika al-ḥartha wal-nasla wal-lahu lā yuḥibbu al-fasāda
